Introduction to Xingtai University

Xingtai University (邢台学院, website) is a full-time undergraduate college. The school’s predecessor, Zhili Fourth Junior Normal School, was founded in 1910 (the second year of the Qing Dynasty) and has a history of 109 years. In the early days of the establishment, the old site still remains on the campus. The old site has witnessed a century of development of teacher education in China. In March 1996, Xingtai Teachers College, Xingtai Education College, and Xingtai Economic Management Cadre School merged to form Xingtai Teachers College. In March 2002, it was upgraded to Xingtai College with the approval of the Ministry of Education.

Xingtai University is located at No. 88, Quanbei East Street, Qiaodong District, Xingtai City. The total value of teaching and scientific research equipment is about 136 million yuan, with more than 1.29 million volumes of paper books and about 220,000 electronic books. There are more than 1,200 faculty members and more than 18,000 full-time students. The school has 20 secondary colleges (departments), 52 undergraduate majors, covering nine disciplines: literature, history, science, engineering, economics, management, law, education and art. There are two major education systems with teacher education and applied talent training as the main body, including 15 undergraduate majors in normal education and 37 undergraduate majors in applied education. It has a national specialty construction site, three provincial key development disciplines, a provincial talent training base, two provincial experimental teaching demonstration centers, and two provincial social science research bases.

Xingtai University has delivered a large number of excellent teachers and application-oriented talents that can be used and retained for the locality. The school’s graduates have spread across various industries in Xingtai City. At present, Xingtai City has 16% of party and government organs, institutions and institutions at the deputy director level or above, and nearly 50% of elementary and middle school teachers are graduates of Xingtai University.

Xingtai University attaches great importance to foreign exchanges and cooperation, and has exchanged visits with teachers, students, cooperative teaching, academic and Different levels of communication and cooperation have been established in cultural exchanges and other fields; it has adopted the method of jointly training master degree students with key universities inside and outside the province. Eight universities including 8 universities have signed a joint postgraduate training framework agreement, and nearly 20 teachers have obtained the qualifications of master tutors outside the cooperative school.

Xingtai University successfully passed the qualification assessment for undergraduate teaching in 2014, and was identified by the Provincial Degree Committee as a master degree authorized construction unit in 2016. At present, the majors of primary education, accounting, English, Chinese language and literature have been included in the undergraduate enrollment, and the majors of dance and physical education have been included in the undergraduate approval of A in advance. In the next few years, focusing on new goals and expanding new connotations, the school will actively implement the “eight projects”, one is the “quality construction project” to comprehensively improve the capacity of the cadre team; the second is the “quality school establishment project” to vigorously improve the quality of personnel training The third is the “Strengthen Talents Project” to strengthen the construction of the teaching staff; the fourth is the “Characteristic School Development Project” to serve local economic and social development; the fifth is the “Reform Living School Project” to stimulate the endogenous driving force of school development; “Open cooperation project”, and strive to expand the field of communication and cooperation; the seventh is the “cultural education project” to create a colorful campus culture; the eighth is the “campus transformation project”, which comprehensively improves the school’s running conditions and helps the school’s development continue to reach new levels.

Xingtai University is taking the spirit of the Third Party Congress as the guide, taking Lithuanshu as the root, improving quality as the core, connotative development as the main line, talent team as the support, comprehensive reform as the driving force, and school management according to law as the The guarantee is to guarantee the party’s strict and comprehensive management, with a broader vision, a more open mind, more pragmatic work, and work hard to build a high-level application-oriented university with distinctive characteristics!
